title: Please
body: Hi, I had a power cut at 4 am last night while playing with a friend and I ended up getting a leaver busters. We were winning the game by a lot so i'm wondering (since I did nothing wrong) if something can be done to get rid of it. Thanks

replies.body: It takes more than one leave to trigger an LPQ. You are responsible for making sure that your connection is stable and reguardless of whether you meant to do it or not. Riot does not lift LPQ's issued by leaverbuster.

I'm sorry, but Riot does not remove Leaverbuster punishments. While this particular incident may not have been your fault, you don't get a punishment for a single leave. If you have a punishment, it means that you have left multiple games in the past, this just happened to be the final one to trigger a punishment.
